GSP28jsbh2-4u:3: “yāvajjīvaṃ darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajete” tyatra kāmye eva svargādyarthe darśapūrṇamāsakarmaṇi jīvanaparyāptakālavidhiḥ /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:12: yathā rāhūparāgānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyi avaśyānuṣṭhānaṃ yasya snānasya tadvattvaṃ rāhūparāge /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:15: karaṇe ca 'dharmeṇa pāpamapanudati' ityādivākyaśeṣāt rātrisatranyāyena pāpakṣaya evānuṣaṅgiko nityanaimittikasthale phalam /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:16: yatratu rathantarasāmatvādinimittasattve naimittikasya pāṭhādeva prāptisaṃbhavenānvayānuvidhānasya pramāṇāntareṇa prāptistatra vyatirekānuvidhāna eva vidhestātparyam /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:18: ataśca yāvajjīvapade lāghavādyanurodhena jīvanasya nimittatvāvagatestadanurodhena pāpakṣayārthaṃ viniyogāntaramevedamiti siddham //
GSP28jsbh2-4u:22: darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo yajeteti kāmyaprayogaṃ vidhāya bahvṛcabrāhmaṇe āmnātaṃ vākyamudāharati ---------- yāvajjīvamiti //
GSP28jsbh2-4u:24_0: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa sūtrānuguṇyena karmadharmatvakartṛdharmatvacintāṃ kṛtāmapi tṛtīyādhyāyasaṃgatāyāstasyā
GSP28jsbh2-4u:24_1: bhedalakṣaṇe 'paryavasite sati karaṇe lakṣaṇāsaṅgatyāpatterayuktāmapi kiṃ yāvajjīvaguṇasaṃyuktānāmagnihotrādīnāṃ prayogā bhidyante;
GSP28jsbh2-4u:25: uta eka evāyaṃ prayogaḥ kāmyaḥ sa eva yāvajjīva kālaparimita ityevaṃ lakṣaṇasaṃgataprayogabhedābhedaphalakatvena vārtikakāraḥ samarthayāmāsa //
GSP28jsbh2-4u:27: vastutastu ---------- prayogāṅgasyāpi yāvajjīvakālasya pūrvaprayoge sāyaṃprātaḥkālāvaruddhe 'varodhasaṃbhavānna yathā pūrvapakṣe prayogabhedakatvam,
GSP28jsbh2-4u:31: uta eka evāyaṃ prayogaḥ kāmyaḥ sa eva yāvajjīvakālaparimita iti vārtikalekhanāt kāmyaprayoge 'yaṃ kālavidhiriti bhramaṃ nivartayituṃ darśapūrṇamāsakarmaṇītyuktam //
GSP28jsbh2-4u:32: (kāmya evetyevakāreṇa siddhānte prakaraṇānanugrahasya pūrvapakṣe tadanugrahasya ca sūcanam)
GSP28jsbh2-4u:34: siddhānte 'pyanāśrayaṇāt paurṇamāsyādikālavidhauca tadāśrayaṇe vinigamanāvirahāt atrāpi tadāpatterihaiva karmoddeśena kālavidhāne sati vakṣyamāṇarītyā prayogavidhiḥ,
GSP28jsbh2-4u:37: (yāvajjīvapadasya ṇamulantatvaṃ na nimittatvena kintu kālavidhitveneti nirūpaṇam)
GSP28jsbh2-4u:39_0: yāvajjīvapadasya ṇamulantasyāpi yāvaddehaṃ tiṣṭhatītivat nirūḍhalakṣaṇayā kālaparatvopapatteḥ
GSP28jsbh2-4u:39_1: abhikrāmaṃ juhotītyatra ṇamulantasyāpi nimittaparatvādarśanādiha kālavidhireva yukta ityarthaḥ /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:43: atra prācīnaiḥ siddhānte paurṇamāsyamāvāsyayordarśapūrṇamāsānuṣṭhānena jīvanaparyāptakālānugrahāsaṃbhavāt yāgābhyāsavidhānāya yajatāvabhyāsalakṣaṇā pūrvapakṣe āpāditā,
GSP28jsbh2-4u:45: evañca nābhyāsalakṣaṇā natarāñca tasya vidheyatvamityevakāreṇa sūcitam /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:50_0: ataeva vidheyatāvacchedakatayā jīvanaparyāpteṣu tāvatsu vyāpyaprayogeṣu tattadvidheyatāvacchedakatayā
GSP28jsbh2-4u:51: vyāpyavyāpakaprayogaviśiṣṭakarmaṇaḥ phalāpekṣāyāṃ svargakāmādivākyena svargārthatayaiva viniyogāt svargādyeva phalam,
GSP28jsbh2-4u:52: natu yāvajjīvavākyena pāpakṣayārthatvena viniyogāt pāpakṣayaḥ pṛthak phalamityarthaḥ /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:53: evañca jīvanaparyāptaistāvadbhiḥ prayogaiḥ ekameva phalaṃ svargādi bhavati,
GSP28jsbh2-4u:58: vastutastu ----------- vyāpakaprayogeṇaiva nirvāhe tattadvyāpyaprayogasvīkāre naiva kiñcit pramāṇam /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:60: paurṇamāsyādivākyeṣu vyāpakaprayogānuvādena tattatkālavidhāne 'pi jīvanakālāvacchedakatvavidhayā tattatkālaniveśasaṃbhavasyaiva niyāmakatvāt /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:64: ataeva prayogabhedābhāvena prakṛtasaṅgatyasaṃbhavena viniyogabhedamādāya saṅgatyupapādanaṃ kaustubhoktaṃ saṃgacchate /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:65: tāvatāpica paurṇamāsyādikālāvacchinnajīvanaparyāptakālikaprayogādeva phalaṃ svargādi nāntarā navā pāpakṣayaḥ phalamityasya phalabhedasya na kṣatiriti dhyeyam //
GSP28jsbh2-4u:67_0: yāvajjīvaśabde hi yāvacchabdasya sāmastyavacanatvāt tasya śakyārthasya puruṣadharmatvena
GSP28jsbh2-4u:67_2: prācīnoktāmapahāya kālalakṣaṇameva pūrvapakṣe āpādayan siddhāntamāha--------- kālalakṣaṇāpatteriti //
GSP28jsbh2-4u:69: saṃbandhavidhayaiva kālabodhopapattermamāpi na lakṣaṇāpattiriti pūrvapakṣiṇo lakṣaṇāparihārāśayaḥ saṃbandhāśrayaṇe cetyanena sūcitaḥ /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:70: yāvacchabdārthasya vidheyatve ekapadopādānāt viśiṣṭaprayogavidhānādvā vākyabhedānāpattāvapi gauravāpattirlāghavādityanena sūcitā /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:72: padārthavidhayā bhāne lakṣaṇācetyubhayaṃ nimittatvamevetyevakāreṇa vyāvartyaṃ sūcitam //
GSP28jsbh2-4u:74: prāṇakriyārūpāṇāṃ jīvanānāṃ bhedānnimittāvṛttyupapatteḥ jīvanagatasāmastyasya naimittikasaṃbandhitvena prāptatvādanuvāda ityarthaḥ //
GSP28jsbh2-4u:77: yatratu vartamānāpadeśena tacchravaṇam yathā yāvaddohamityatra tatrānuṣṭhānasyaivābodhanena nānuṣṭhāpakatvarūpatadapekṣayā dhātvarthāntarasaṃbandhaḥ,
GSP28jsbh2-4u:84: tataḥ kena vā dohasya nimittatvaṃ vāryate” iti /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:85_0: ato jīvanasya nimittatvāt nimittasyānuṣṭhāpakatve 'pi prayogākṣepakatve pramāṇābhāvāt
GSP28jsbh2-4u:86_1: jīvanasya nimittatvānna tithyantarasya jīvane nimittatvasya na vaikasyāmeva paurṇamāsyāṃ
GSP28jsbh2-4u:87: paurvāhṇikakālāvacchinnapaurṇamāsyāmeva pratikṣaṇañjīvanabhedamādāyāvṛttyāpādanaṃ tvaśakyatvādeva na saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ //
GSP28jsbh2-4u:99: atra prābhākarairvidheyākaraṇasya vidhinā pratyavāyajanakatvabodhane 'pi karaṇasya naiva kiñcitphalamityaṅgīkriyate /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:102: kāmyamānena svargādiphalenāvaśyakatvānirvāhāt viśvajinnyāyena svargaphalakalpanāyogāt phalaviśeṣāpekṣāyāṃ “dharmeṇa pāpamapanudati,
GSP28jsbh2-4u:104: ” “yadrātryā pāpamakārṣaṃ yadahnā pāpamakārṣaṃ manasā vācā hastābhyāṃ” ityādivākyaśeṣebhyo niṣiddhācaraṇajanyapratyavāyakṣayasya phalatvamavasīyate ityarthaḥ /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:108: akaraṇe pratyavāyabhiyā pravṛttasya pāpakṣayārthaṃ pravṛttyabhāvamapekṣya pāpakṣayasyānuṣaṅgikatvoktiḥ /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:113: prayojanaṃ pūrvapakṣe yāvajjīvamabhyastarūpaka ekaḥ kāmya eva proyagaḥ jīvanakālasya vikṛtau sauryādāvatideśādyāvajjīviko 'bhyāsaḥ,
GSP28jsbh2-4u:114: siddhānte tvaphalakāmasyāpi sāyaṃprātaḥkālayorabhyastarūpastatraivaca parisamāpta ekaḥ prayogaḥ /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:115: sāyaṃprātaḥkālāntare tathaivāparaḥ sauryeca nimittasyānatideśānna yāvajjīvaṃ prayoga iti spaṣṭatvānnoktam //
GSP28jsbh2-4u:121: prakṛte tūktapramāṇairutpattiparatvāvagame 'pi puruṣabhedāttattacchākhādhyāyipuruṣān pratyekasyaiva karmaṇaḥ sarvatrotpattisaṃbhavānna karmabhedaḥ /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:125: ata eva vedabhede puruṣābhedādekatraivotpattiraparatra guṇārthaṃ śravaṇabhityatra niyāmakaṃ vakṣyate /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:126: vedaikatve tu pratiśākhaṃ puruṣabhedāt satyapi sarveṣāmutpattiparatve na karmabhedaḥ /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:127: ata evaikasmin karmaṇi viruddhānāṃ nānāśākhāgatāṅgānāṃ vikalpaḥ /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:132: yattu 'bahnalpaṃ vā svagṛhyoktaṃ' ityādivacanantat sarvāṅgopasaṃhārāsaṃbhave 'nukalpavidhānārthamiti kaustubhe draṣṭavyam /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:137: iti śrīkhaṇḍadevaviracitāyāṃ bhāṭṭadīpikāyāṃ dvitīyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //
GSP28jsbh2-4u:144: ataeva -------- vedāntaragate “bhūyastvenobhayaśrutī“titārtīyanyāyena yatra vede dravyadevatāśravaṇāt rūpalābhastatraivotpattiḥ,
GSP28jsbh2-4u:155: tathā śabdāntarasyāpi samānadhātvarthakatvāt itaradhātvarthāpekṣayā bhedakatvasya siddhānte 'pīṣṭatvānnabhedakatvam /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:161_1: yathaivādhvaryuṃ vṛṇīte ityatra satyapyadhvaryoruddeśyatve vṛtenādhvaryuṇā svakāryaṃ
GSP28jsbh2-4u:162: tathehāpyadhītena svādhyāyenārthajñānaṃ bhāvayediti kalpyaviniyogavidhau upādeyatvaśravaṇāt tadvivakṣeti nirāsaḥ sūcitaḥ /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:165_0: “anayā trayyā vidyayā lokaṃ jayati” “vedānadhītya vedau vā vedaṃ vāpi yathākrama”
GSP28jsbh2-4u:170_0: vedabhedena tadadhyayanasya sarvapuruṣān pratyavirodhāt tadgatavidhipunaḥ śravaṇasyādhyetṛbhedapuraskāreṇa
GSP28jsbh2-4u:170_1: jñānārthatvena parihārāsaṃbhavāt ubhayotpattau prāptāyāṃ bhūyodharmāmnānaṃ yatra
GSP28jsbh2-4u:170_2: tatrotpattiritaratra guṇārthaṃ śravaṇamityarthabhūyastvaṃ niyāmakaṃ tṛtīye vakṣyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:171: evaṃ yatra sāmavede ekasyāmeva śākhāyāṃ pañcaviṃśaṣaṅviṃśākhyabrāhmaṇabhedastatrāpyadhyetṛbhedābhāvādekatra vidhiraparatrānuvādo bādhakāsattve,
GSP28jsbh2-4u:174: tattadadhyetṝn prati ajñātotpattijñāpakatayā vidhipunaḥśravaṇopapatterna karmabheda ityarthaḥ //
GSP28jsbh2-4u:175_0: evaṃ vidhipunaḥ śravaṇasyānyaparatvādabhyāsasya bhedakatve niraste tenaivānupasthitirūpaprakaraṇāntarasya
GSP28jsbh2-4u:177: ata eva ekatareṇaikatarasya bādhāyogādekārthatve sati vrīhiyavayoriva vikalpa ityarthaḥ /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:178: kāṭhakādisamākhyānāṃ śākhāsviva karmaṇyapi prayogāt tābhirādhvaryavādisamākhyāvat puruṣaviśeṣaniyamopapattyāśaṅkāmabhipretya pariharati ---------- saceti //
GSP28jsbh2-4u:179: karmaṇi prayogasya kaṭhaproktagranthavihitasaṃbandhanimittakasya kartṛtāsaṃbandhena kaṭhādiniyāmakatvāyogāt na tena vyavasthāsiddhirityarthaḥ //
GSP28jsbh2-4u:183: śūdrasya tadākṣepasaṃbhave 'pi tadupāyādhyayananiṣedhānna taditi vaiṣamyamiti bhāvaḥ //
GSP28jsbh2-4u:185: nanu -------- śākhāntarīyāṅgopasaṃhāre “bahvalpaṃ vā svagṛhyoktaṃ yasya yāvat prakīrttitaṃ /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:186_0: tasya tāvati śāstrārthe kṛte sarvaḥ kṛto bhave” diti vacanena svagṛhyapadasyopalakṣaṇatayā
GSP28jsbh2-4u:186_1: svagṛhyoktasya svaśākhāvagatasya vānuṣṭhānaniyamavidhānāt tena virodha ityāśaṅkānirāsāyāha
GSP28jsbh2-4u:194: teṣāmiti bahuvacanena ataḥ paramityanenaca sūcitottarādhyāyārthanirūpaṇaṃ pratyetadadhyāyārthanirūpaṇasya hetuhetumadbhāvarūpā saṅgatiruttaratra spaṣṭībhaviṣyati //
GSP28jsbh2-4u:196: iti kavimaṇḍana-khaṇḍadevaśiṣya-śuṃbhubhaṭṭaviracitāyāṃ bhāṭṭadīpikāvyākhyāyāṃ prabhāvalyāṃ dvitīyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //
